attributes.action: make a law for baby parking bays in car parks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned wish for a law similar to disabled parking, for parents/careers of children under 5 years of age. Not asking to be aloud to park on double yellows, just in the car parks where alot off people park their cars, even though they have no children etc.. if their is not going to be a law then why bother having these bays as anyone can use them.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
